ggbscript.onUpdate: If(SelectedElement(Presets)=="Convex",{ SetCoords(A,-0.28,-1.96), SetCoords(B,-0.29,-0.92), SetCoords(C,0.65,-2.16), SetCoords(D,0.41,-2.27), SetCoords(screenP,0,-0.18), SetValue(αScreen,45°)}, If(SelectedElement(Presets)=="Concave",{ SetCoords(A,-0.63,-1.73), SetCoords(B,-0.09,-2.02), SetCoords(C,0.41,-1.23), SetCoords(D,0.18,-2.58), SetCoords(screenP,0,-0.18), SetValue(αScreen,45°)}, If(SelectedElement(Presets)=="Complex",{ SetCoords(A,1.28,0.27), SetCoords(B,-0.64,-1.01), SetCoords(C,0.6,-2.03), SetCoords(D,-0.21,-1.82), SetCoords(screenP,0,1.47), SetValue(αScreen,45°)}))) SetValue(d,Distance(screenP,screenPH)) SetValue(G,Gx) SetValue(gA,A-Gx) SetValue(gB,B-Gx) SetValue(gC,C-Gx) SetValue(gD,D-Gx)
